name: Ping Pong Run
description:
"It might be more addicting than Flappy Bird." - coolmaterial.com

"It's beautifully designed, ultra-simple, stupidly addicting, and too much fun." - airows.com

From the animation studio Tenggrenska comes a simple and addictive ping pong game. For how long time can you keep the run going? Enjoy the stunning design and animations when you play!

• Endless challenge
